Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Reconstructed necklace composed mainly of disc-shaped ostrich eggshell beads, arranged around a central motif made of mixed disc-shaped beads of blue-turquoise and black faience. Smaller blue beads complete the two extremities of the piece of jewellery. Once again, the arrangement of the piece and the materials utilised are typical of the C-Group culture.
